data.event: Farmington received its village charter in 1872 making Farmington the second oldest community in Dakota County after the county seat, Hastings.

event.title: the movement of the Dakota County Fair to Farmington in 1869

data.event: A notable event in Farmington's history is the movement of the Dakota County Fair to Farmington in 1869.
Another event, the Great Fire of Farmington on November 22, 1879, destroyed several houses, stores, a hotel, and a grain elevator in the current downtown area.
Farmington High School graduated its first class in 1884.
